meanings.definition: A person who arbitrates in a dispute or competition.
meanings.sent1: The referee made a fair decision in the soccer match.
meanings.sent2: The referee at the debate competition ensured fairness.
meanings.sent3: The referee at the spelling bee was very serious about the word choices.
meanings.sent4: She acted as a referee in the argument between her friends.
meanings.sent5: The referee's role is crucial in maintaining order during a game.

meanings.definition: To act as an official in a game or sport, ensuring that the rules are followed.
meanings.sent1: He will referee the basketball game tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys refereeing soccer matches on weekends.
meanings.sent3: I will referee the game, but only if I get a cool whistle.
meanings.sent4: Refereeing the match felt like being the captain of a ship.
meanings.sent5: Refereeing requires a good understanding of the game rules.
